TheRailgun:Aerial_Shot.NAME: Aerial Shot
TheRailgun:Aerial_Shot.DESCRIPTION: Requires Magnetic Flight or Magnetic Movement. NL Deal !D! Damage.
TheRailgun:Aerial_Shot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Requires Magnetic Flight or Magnetic Movement. NL Deal !D! Damage.

TheRailgun:Charge.NAME: Charge
TheRailgun:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Lightning Orb. NL Gain 2 Strength.

TheRailgun:Circuitous.NAME: Circuitous
TheRailgun:Circuitous.DESCRIPTION: Switch your Dexterity with an enemy.
TheRailgun:Circuitous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch your Dexterity with an enemy.

TheRailgun:Coin_Flip.NAME: Coin Flip
TheRailgun:Coin_Flip.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Lightning Orb. NL Draw 1 Card.
TheRailgun:Coin_Flip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel a Lightning Orb. NL Draw 2 Cards.

TheRailgun:Crack.NAME: Crack
TheRailgun:Crack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and Evoke an Orb.

TheRailgun:Crackle.NAME: Crackle
TheRailgun:Crackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each Channeled Orb.
TheRailgun:Crackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each Channeled Orb.

TheRailgun:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
TheRailgun:Discharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke an Orb. NL Gain 2 Dexterity.

TheRailgun:Electric_Fence.NAME: Electric Fence
TheRailgun:Electric_Fence.DESCRIPTION: Gain 7 Block and deal 3 damage to each enemy that attacks you this turn.
TheRailgun:Electric_Fence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 7 Block and deal 3 damage to each enemy that attacks you this turn.

TheRailgun:Electrical_Storm.NAME: Electrical Storm
TheRailgun:Electrical_Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X Damage twice to each enemy.

TheRailgun:Gekota_Keychain.NAME: Gekota Keychain
TheRailgun:Gekota_Keychain.DESCRIPTION: Remove 1 Curse from your deck until the end of the battle.
TheRailgun:Gekota_Keychain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 Curse Cards from your deck until the end of the battle.

TheRailgun:Gekotamania.NAME: Gekotamania
TheRailgun:Gekotamania.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Card for each Relic you have.
TheRailgun:Gekotamania.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards for each Relic you have.

TheRailgun:Heroinism.NAME: Heroinism
TheRailgun:Heroinism.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.
TheRailgun:Heroinism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

TheRailgun:Iron_Dust_Field.NAME: Iron-Dust Field
TheRailgun:Iron_Dust_Field.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. NL Gain 2 Thorns.

TheRailgun:Level_6.NAME: Level 6
TheRailgun:Level_6.DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Energy. NL Gain 6 Strength. NL Gain 6 Dexterity.
TheRailgun:Level_6.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Energy. NL Gain 6 Strength. NL Gain 6 Dexterity. NL Recover 20% HP.

TheRailgun:Lightning_Speed.NAME: Lightning Speed
TheRailgun:Lightning_Speed.DESCRIPTION: Increase Damage dealt by 25%. NL Not stackable.
TheRailgun:Lightning_Speed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase Damage dealt by 25%. NL Not stackable.1

TheRailgun:Lightningbolt.NAME: Lightningbolt
TheRailgun:Lightningbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.
TheRailgun:Lightningbolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel 2 Lightning Orbs.

TheRailgun:Magnetic_Flight.NAME: Magnetic Flight
TheRailgun:Magnetic_Flight.DESCRIPTION: Decrease damage taken from enemy attacks by 50%. Not stackable.
TheRailgun:Magnetic_Flight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Decrease damage taken from enemy attacks by 50%. NL Not stackable.

TheRailgun:Magnetic_Movement.NAME: Magnetic Movement
TheRailgun:Magnetic_Movement.DESCRIPTION: Decrease Damage received by 25%. NL Not stackable.
TheRailgun:Magnetic_Movement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Decrease Damage received by 25%. NL Not stackable.

TheRailgun:Overload.NAME: Overload
TheRailgun:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Lower the cost of all Cards by 1. NL Take 5 Damage at the end of each turn.
TheRailgun:Overload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lower the cost of all Cards by 1. NL Take 5 Damage at the end of each turn.

TheRailgun:Railgun.NAME: Railgun
TheRailgun:Railgun.DESCRIPTION: Remove an enemy's Block and deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 5 Vulnerable and 5 Weak.
TheRailgun:Railgun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove an enemy's Block and deal !D! Damage. NL Apply 5 Vulnerable and 5 Weak.

TheRailgun:Recharge.NAME: Recharge
TheRailgun:Recharge.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card and gain Energy equal to its Cost. NL Exhaust
TheRailgun:Recharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card and gain Energy equal to its Cost. NL Exhaust

TheRailgun:Rewiring.NAME: Rewiring
TheRailgun:Rewiring.DESCRIPTION: Switch your Strength with an enemy.
TheRailgun:Rewiring.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Switch your Strength with an enemy.

TheRailgun:Scatter_Railgun.NAME: Scatter Railgun
TheRailgun:Scatter_Railgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to each enemy and remove Block.
TheRailgun:Scatter_Railgun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to each enemy and remove Block. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.

TheRailgun:Spark.NAME: Spark
TheRailgun:Spark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage plus 1 for each Channeled Orb.
TheRailgun:Spark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damaged plus 2 for each Channeled Orb.

TheRailgun:Stun_Shock.NAME: Stun-Shock
TheRailgun:Stun_Shock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and remove Block. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Apply 1 Weak.
TheRailgun:Stun_Shock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and remove Block. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Apply 1 Weak.

TheRailgun:Supercharge.NAME: Supercharge
TheRailgun:Supercharge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all Cards for the rest of the battle.
TheRailgun:Supercharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all Cards for the rest of the battle.

TheRailgun:Taser.NAME: Taser
TheRailgun:Taser.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs on non-Boss enemy.
TheRailgun:Taser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs on non-Boss enemy.

TheRailgun:Thunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
TheRailgun:Thunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.
TheRailgun:Thunderbolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.

TheRailgun:Thunderjolt.NAME: Thunderjolt
TheRailgun:Thunderjolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal X Damage for each Channeled Orb.
TheRailgun:Thunderjolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal X Damage for each Channeled Orb. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.

TheRailgun:Thundershock.NAME: Thundershock
TheRailgun:Thundershock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.

TheRailgun:Thundervolt.NAME: Thundervolt
TheRailgun:Thundervolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each Channeled Orb.
TheRailgun:Thundervolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each Channeled Orb.

TheRailgun:Token_Collection.NAME: Token Collection
TheRailgun:Token_Collection.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 Card in your Discard Pile and add it to your hand.
TheRailgun:Token_Collection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 Cards in your Discard Pile and add them to your hand.

TheRailgun:Zap.NAME: Zap
TheRailgun:Zap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.
TheRailgun:Zap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Channel a Lightning Orb.
